ðŸ“– Summary: Tolgee is an open-source localization platform designed to streamline the translation process for developers and translators. It offers features like in-context translation, one-click screenshots, and production environment translation capabilities. Tolgee integrates seamlessly into applications through powerful SDKs, providing a truly embedded translation experience.
